people_also_ask.heading: Final Fantasy VI is the sixth main entry in the Final Fantasy series and the first to be directed by someone other than series creator Hironobu Sakaguchi; the role was instead filled by Yoshinori Kitase and Hiroyuki Ito. ... In 2017, Nintendo re-released Final Fantasy VI as part of the company's Super NES Classic Edition.
